transformations.name: mappedEmailRecipients
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RawEmailRecipient
source(output(
		id as string,
		sender_id as string,
		parent_id as string,
		email_thread_id as string,
		subject as string,
		date as string,
		message_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		updated_at as string,
		mailbox_message_id as string,
		perimeter as string,
		is_answer as string,
		is_event_message as string,
		in_reply_to as string,
		time_zone as string,
		thread_subject as string,
		is_forwarded as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Email
RawEmailRecipient derive(er_id = toString(byName('id')),
		er_recipient_id = toString(byName('recipient_id')),
		er_email_id = toString(byName('email_id')),
		er_status = toString(byName('status')),
		er_created_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_through_list = toString(byName('through_list')),
		er_read_delay = toString(byName('read_delay')),
		er_mailbox_message_id = toString(byName('mailbox_message_id')),
		er_is_read = toString(byName('is_read')),
		er_read_time = toString(byName('read_time')),
		er_delivered_date = toString(byName('delivered_date'))) ~> mappedEmailRecipients
mappedEmailRecipients, emailDeriv join(er_email_id == em_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Email derive(em_id = toString(byName('id'))) ~> emailDeriv
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true) ~> preprocess
